scripts.build: rimraf dist && npx webpack && node chmod && cp src/package.json dist/package.json && cp src/README.md dist/README.md
scripts.preDeploy: npm run build && npm run link && npm run test:success
scripts.test:basic: npm run test:export:success && npm run test:layer:success
scripts.test:export:success: pixaki export testFiles/crate.pixaki && pixaki export testFiles/grogu.pixaki && px e testFiles/ipad-share.pixaki
scripts.test:layer:success: pixaki layer testFiles/crate.pixaki 'Arbitrary Map' && pixaki layer testFiles/another-crate.pixaki 'RangeTest' && pixaki layer testFiles/another-crate.pixaki 'Static'
scripts.test:columns:success: pixaki export testFiles/crate.pixaki --columns=1 && pixaki layer testFiles/crate.pixaki 'Arbitrary Map' --columns=1
scripts.test:success: npm run test:export:success && npm run test:layer:success && npm run test:columns:success && npm run test:outDir:success
scripts.test:failure: npm run test:export:failure && npm run test:layer:failure
